_meanings:
{@--1@} A 
restingplace, seat, substratum;  
{#sOhfdAdapfTagASrayAmimAM#} <ls>U. 1. 45</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; so  
{#ASrayAsidDa#} <ab>q. v.</ab> below.

{@--2@} That on which
anything depends or rests, or
with which it is closely 
connected.

{@--3@} Recipient, receptacle, a
person or thing in which any 
quality is present or retained &c.;
{#tamASrayaM duzprasahasya tejasaH#} <ls>R. 3. 58.</ls>

{@--6@} 
Following, practising; <ls>Ms. 2. 11.</ls>

{@--8@} Dependence on; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>;
{#mama sarve vizayAstvadASrayAH#} <ls>R. 8. 69.</ls>

{@--10@} A prop,
support; <ls>R. 9. 60.</ls>

{@--11@} Help, 
assistance, protection.

{@--12@} A quiver;
{#bARamASrayamuKAt samudDaran#} <ls>R. 11. 26.</ls>
{@--13@} Authority, sanction, warrant.

{@--14@} Connection, relation, 
association.
{@--15@} Union, attachment.

{@--16@}
A plea, an excuse.

{@--17@} Contiguity,
vicinity.

{@--18@} Seeking shelter or
protection with another (= {#saMSraya#}),
one of the six {%gunas%}, <ab>q. v.</ab>

{@--19@} An
appropriate act, or one consistent
with character.
{@--20@} Source, origin.

{@--21@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The subject, or that
to which the predicate is attached.

{@--22@} (With Buddhists) The five
organs of sense with {%Manas%} or
mind.

consuming
every thing with which it comes
in contact.
{2} a forfeiter of asylum.

{3}
the constellation {#kfttikA#}.

one
who is the refuge or support (of
another person).

an adjective
(a word which must agree in gender 

with the word which it qualifies or
refers to).
